name: VRScouting
description:
What if… I were a scout? 

VRScouting is an adventure into the woods created to bring children closer to nature. Four challenges thought to teach some basic knowledge to survive into the nature. A special guide is ready to carry the user out of the wood and to reward him with medals. 

The aim of this application is to present the scouting world to children in order to let them understand if this could become a new passion.

COMMANDS

WForwards        SBackwards      A        Left   D    Right       Shift   Run  Left Mouse ButtonInventory Interaction       Left Mouse Button Turn Diary's pages  Right Mouse Button      ZoomMouse Movement Visual Pointer Left CTRLCrouch       Space Bar    Jump   Z            Lie Down        TAB    Inventory  E   Guide's Intercation, Collecting Items             R       Take, Put  Items in the Inventory    Q  Create New Items   F            Diary's opening and memorizationESC  Menu/Quit 

CREATORS 

Flavia Gentile                                                                                                                                              Riccardo Lacqua                                                                                                                          Edoardo Maglio                                                                                                                                        Massimiliano Pellegrino                                                                                                                          Anna Sansoè

We are a group of students attending the Virtual reality course held by the Master course in Cinema and media engineering of Politecnico di Torino.
